{{Infobox Berry |name = #14 Pinap |image = [[File:Pinap.png]] |caption = It is said that when the sour skin is peeled, this spicy Berry can be crushed to make medicine. |growtime = 4m 0s |harvest = 13 berries |replant = 40% |points = 35 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *10 sour }} '''Pinap''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Sitrus]] and at least 1 [[Aspear]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 30 secs || 1 min || 3 mins || 4 mins - 8 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PinapTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PinapTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PinapTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Pinap berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || || || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || || || [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || |- | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || || || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |} {{Berries}}
